title: The Week in Ransomware - January 12th 2024 - Targeting homeowners' data
description: Mortgage lenders and related companies are becoming popular targets of ransomware gangs, with four companies in this sector recently attacked. [...]

title: CISA: Critical Microsoft SharePoint bug now actively exploited
description: CISA warns that attackers are now exploiting a critical Microsoft SharePoint privilege escalation vulnerability that can be chained with another critical bug for remote code execution. [...]

title: GitLab warns of critical zero-click account hijacking vulnerability
description: GitLab has released security updates for both the Community and Enterprise Edition to address two critical vulnerabilities, one of them allowing account hijacking with no user interaction. [...]

title: Juniper warns of critical RCE bug in its firewalls and switches
description: Juniper Networks has released security updates to fix a critical pre-auth remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in its SRX Series firewalls and EX Series switches. [...]

title: Ivanti Connect Secure zero-days exploited to deploy custom malware
description: Hackers have been exploiting the two zero-day vulnerabilities in Ivanti Connect Secure disclosed this week since early December to deploy multiple families of custom malware for espionage purposes. [...]
